<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pack Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5598) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

Ambushes are an honored kholo tradition. You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5224) feat and can extend its effects to a single ally so long as they remain within 10 feet of you. If you have master proficiency in Stealth, you can extend the effect to two allies. If you have legendary proficiency in Stealth, you can extend it to four allies.
name: Pack Stalker
